headline: KnitWell Group Signs 246,000 Square Foot Renewal & Expansion at BXP’s 7 Times Square in New York
summary: NEW YORK, January 13, 2025--BXP (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that it signed an approximately 246,000 square foot long-term lease renewal and expansion with KnitWell Group at 7 Times Square in New York City, New York. The 20-year lease comprises the existing approximately 191,000 square foot premises plus two additional full floors totaling approximately 55,000 square feet.
